participant_1.background:
I have to work, but I'm bringing my blender to make my own iced coffee!
I sometimes neglect my own needs in order to be there for my kids.
i studied business as my major.
I enjoy wearing comfortable, loose clothing that allows me to move around easily in my wheelchair.
I'm a teacher who cares about my students' success.

participant_2.background:
I listen to music that makes me forget about my troubles and live in the moment.
my motor never stops running.
I am proud of my ability to cook a variety of cuisines and my willingness to treat everyone with respect.
i love the rain.
I do not own a home because I would rather spend my money on Mountain Dew and pastries.

content.text: Good morning! I'm on my way to work and I'm making my own iced coffee in a blender. It's going to be a long day.
Good morning! I love making my own iced coffee too, it's so much better than the stuff you get at the store.
Me too! I have to work with kids all day, so I need all the caffeine I can get.
Oh, that sounds like a tough job. I'm glad I don't have to work with kids.
It can be challenging, but it's also really rewarding. I love seeing my students learn and grow.
That's awesome! I'm sure you're a great teacher.
Thanks! I try my best.
I'm sure you do. What kind of music do you like to listen to?
I like a lot of different kinds of music, but I especially like music that makes me feel good and helps me forget about my troubles.
Me too! I love music that makes me feel alive and happy.
What kind of cuisines can you cook?
I can cook a variety of cuisines, but my favorite is probably Mexican food.
Mexican food is my favorite too! I love tacos and burritos.
Me too! I love all the different flavors and textures.
I do too! What's your favorite Mountain Dew flavor?
My favorite Mountain Dew flavor is Code Red.
Code Red is my favorite too!
I love the cherry flavor.
Me too! It's so refreshing.
I agree! It's the perfect drink to enjoy on a hot day.
I know, right? It's so good.
I'm glad we have similar tastes in music and food.
Me too! It's always nice to meet someone who likes the same things you do.
I agree
